description:
Supportive and breathable, these tights use FlashDry™ technology to wick moisture during your run or training session. With their high-rise waist you'll have plenty of coverage so you can wear them alone or slide them under a pair of shorts.

  • Breathable polyester and elastane knit supports muscles during strenuous activity
  • FlashDry™ fabric moves moisture away from skin for quick evaporation
  • Power-mesh, drop-in pocket on left and right hip
  • Drop-in pockets on left and right outer thighs
  • Secure-zip pocket on center back waistband
  • Inseam gusset for improved fit and mobility
name: The North Face Trailwear QTM High-Rise 7/8 Tights - Women's
